Carson.KBUE:
KBUE (105.5 FM, "Que Buena 105.5/94.3 FM") is a Spanish language regional Mexican music station licensed to Long Beach, California, owned by Liberman Broadcasting.


== History ==


=== 105.5 FM ===

105.5 FM was formerly KNAC, a heavy metal music station until February 15, 1995, after the station was sold to Liberman, a Spanish-language broadcasting company. It acquired the KBUE call letters a few weeks later on March 6.
